title: Essential Politics: Legal fight over suspended travel ban continues today in 'out of control' California
text: Melanie Mason explains why the law's defenders are focusing on the Valley. It's one of the regions with the most at stake if the law is repealed, and, as a rare Republican enclave, it's represented in Congress by those who will determine the law's fate, including House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy.
summary:
Melanie Mason explains why the law's defenders are focusing on the Valley.
It's one of the regions with the most at stake if the law is repealed, and, as a rare Republican enclave, it's represented in Congress by those who will determine the law's fate, including House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy.
